extendedInfo.description: Premium version of Field Compass. It has all the features of the free app plus :-â Shows current location.â User selectable coordinate grid.â Includes MGRS grid for military use.â Over 100 map datums.â Auto declination using the GPS.â No Ads.Field Compass Plus is a powerful and simple compass app, with all the data you need on one clear screen. This easy to use Android compass has a unique sighting screen to take and store bearings to help keep you on track. The app shows your heading on an analogue compass, together with a digital centre panel displaying your heading in degrees.Your compass heading and bearings are referenced to True or Magnetic North. You can also adjust the Declination for your current location.Record up to three compass bearings using the three middle buttons on the top tool bar. The bearings can be displayed around the compass and can be used to get a three point compass fix.Can be used in a marine environment for sailing, boating (now includes pitch and roll fields)A great compass to use when hiking, hill climbing, walking or for general outdoor navigation and map reading training.Anyone interested in Orienteering should download this compass app as a backup compass.Other features: -Night mode with dimmed red colours.Orientation field i.e. (N,S,E,W,NE,SW etc)True North reference optionDeclination field, with user configurable value

reviews.title: Simple enough, but with a few nice additions
reviews.comment: Bought this app because it does not request any special permissions like other free compass (e.g. some need phone access! - do not install them!). It can use the declination from the GPS or you can set it manually, and you can set a few targets to point to. Still a few improvements I would like:  - The labels E/S/W/N etc. are a little hard to find/read since they are in small letters and in the same colour as the whole bearing. A different colour (white labels in the holo dark blue theme would do it).  - The GPS accuracy is shown in feet. Would be nice to see this value in meters. Nothing else I would change.
reviews.author: Thomas Perschak

reviews.title: Great App from a developer who really does his feedback!
reviews.comment: Extremely useful app (even just as a free app) but the paid version is definitely worth it.  Very nice to see a developer who reads feedback, understands users and acts on it!  Solid 5 Stars from me!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Effective tool
reviews.comment: I was actually looking for a qibla compass but saw this and thought why not.     Surprisingly effective.     I\'ve often been frustrated by traditional magnetic compasses where interference (whether electrical or material) results in glaringly wrong readings.     The roll and pitch feature means that it could even double suggests that it may double up as a simple spirit level.     One addition i would welcome would be to be able to type in a bearing to provide a guidleline to align to.
reviews.author: jameel siddiq

reviews.title: Doesn\'t seem to be able to get a GPS fix
reviews.comment: Same issue on Nexus 4 and Galaxy Nexus.
reviews.author: Steve Williams

reviews.comment: Last update fixed the locking and obvious wrong reading issues.

reviews.title: Excellent compass
reviews.comment: One of the best looking and functioning compasses on Android. The only thing that could make it better is the ability to mark and save waypoint locations. Please add this functionality and you\'ll have the best lightweight navigation compass out.
reviews.author: Brian Kieft

reviews.title: Zero stars, does not work
reviews.comment: Useless.  Multiple 90* turns yield only 30* changes. Half off the price spared too much wasted ca$h. They actually have an in-app disclaimer saying it\'s not guaranteed to be functional. You see that AFTER making the purchase.  Ah, well, the UK needs the business.
reviews.author: Michael Grady

reviews.title: Great field compass
reviews.comment: Great use of GPS data to determine magnetic Declination!  I will give 5 star if the program can also add the automatic sun rise, sunset, moon rise/set data of the day determined by GPS location as a bearing features!  That would become an Ultimate compass in the world!
reviews.author: Steven Ng

reviews.comment: Just what I need. Perfect compass app!
